sen.e: Dosho, a monk, is said to have built the first bridge between 834 and 848, and later Ryoi SUMINOKURA is said to have built the bridge at the place where the present one is.

sen.j: 亀山天皇が、橋の上空を移動していく月を眺めて「くまなき月の渡るに似る」と感想を述べたことから渡月橋と名付けられた。
sen.e: When Emperor Kameyama saw a moon move above the bridge, he said, 'It looks as if the clear moon were walking over the bridge,' so it was named 'Togetsu-kyo' (the moon going bridge).
